projects.details: mothers2mothers is an international nonprofit organisation dedicated to preventing mother-to-child transmission of HIV by providing education and support for pregnant women and new mothers living with HIV. mothers2mothers believes in the power of women to eliminate paediatric AIDS and create health and hope for themselves and their babies, families, and communities. I worked as part of a social innovation team helping mothers2mothers to move from a paper based records system to digital system which was in use in 700 sites accross africa.

Fundación Paraguaya is a leading edge self-sufficient social enterprise founded in Paraguay in 1985 that seeks to develop innovative solutions to poverty and unemployment, and proactively disseminate them throughout the world. I worked as part of a team which created a visual survey mobile application to allow Fundación Paraguaya to asses the living conditions of poor families in a more personnal and meaningful way.

HP InContext Analytics was a POC for a plugin for Microsoft Lync which used Autonomy's big data search engine IDOL to search a companies internal documents or the web for results which were relevant to the ongoing Lync conversation. For this project I worked as one of the lead developers helping to architect, design and develope the solution accross the full stack.

The HPE TeleHealthcare platform provides an out of the box fully managed service that provides care to people through Mobile solutions through integrated medical devices, a clinical data repository and telecommunication services which is fully managed and hosted in the Cloud. For this solution I acted as architect helping to design the end to end solution and Lead Developer guiding the development of the backend services, front end portal, mobile applicaion and medical device integration.

Diabetes Digital Coach is an NHS / IoT (Internet of Things) test bed project, a unique collaboration between 10 partners. It is led by the West of England Academic Health Science Network (AHSN) and funded by the Department of Health through Innovate UK. In this project I am working as the Lead developer for the backend services handling the integration of partner data and serving of data for the front end portal.
Just a simple card matching game I built for my son to help with his fine motor skills.

FleetManager is a cloud-based analytics platform and information management engine which unlocks valuable data for every user in the organisation. Optimised to work with ORBCOMM's truck, trailer, refrigerated and container monitoring devices, FleetManager delivers advanced reporting and analytics for the entire fleet on one single platform.

An innovative IT services organization at HPE built to make Hybrid IT simple and power the Intelligent Edge. Our work focused on building the HPE customer support portal particularly searching products using a variety of in house technologies as well as third party tools such as Coveo.
